publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4069 Dr Richard Simpson: World No Tobacco Day 2009—That the Parliament supports World No Tobacco Day on 31 May; notes that Scotland has made a significant step to support smokers stopping through its ban on smoking in public places but recognises that more will need to be done to further reduce this public health challenge, and congratulates Dr Judith Longstaff Mackay, an Edinburgh graduate and Fellow of the Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh, on receiving the British Medical Journal Group’s first-ever Lifetime Achievement Award in recognition of her work in reducing smoking worldwide but especially across Asia in her role as senior policy advisor to the World Health Organization and World Lung Foundation.
S3M-4069 World No Tobacco Day 2009 (lodged on 5 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
